8  int Learning::runAlgorithm(const cv::Mat &input_image, const sensor_msgs::Imu &imu, nav_msgs::Odometry &odom_estimated, cv::Mat &output_image, std::string &image_encoding){
9  static int state = 0;
10 
11  cv::Mat mat, bw;
12  std::vector<cv::Point> contours;
13  landmark::Descriptor descriptor;
14 
15  // state 0: camera is not calibrated
16  // state 1: camera is calibrated
17  if (state==0){
18  if(this->camera_calibrated_ == true){
19  this->resetParameters();
20  this->begin_ = ros::Time::now();
21  state = 1;
22  }else
23  return -1;
24  }
25 
26  // Converting image colorspace to gray
27  if (image_encoding == "rgb8"){
28  this->rgbToGray(input_image, mat);
29  } else if (image_encoding != "mono8"){
30  return -1;
31  }
32 
33  // Converting gray image to black and white.
34  this->grayToBW(mat, bw);
35 
36  // Crop original image into ROI
37  this->cropImage(bw, mat);
38 
39  // Learning process.
40  cv::Point offset = cv::Point(this->roi_.x_offset,roi_.y_offset);
41  bool result = (this->blob_).learnMinMax(mat, offset, descriptor, contours);
42 
43  // Adjust ROI when successfully found landmark.
44  if (result == true){
45  int span = std::max(30, (int) (2*descriptor.dynamic.radius) );
46  this->roi_.x_offset = std::max(0, (int) descriptor.dynamic.uc - span);
47  this->roi_.y_offset = std::max(0, (int) descriptor.dynamic.vc - span);
48  this->roi_.height = std::min( (int) (this->height_ - this->roi_.y_offset), 2*span);
49  this->roi_.width = std::min( (int) (this->width_ - this->roi_.x_offset), 2*span);
50  }
51 
52  // Draw ROI rectangle on output image
53  output_image = bw;
54 
55  /* cv::rectangle(output_image,
56  cv::Point(this->roi_.x_offset, this->roi_.y_offset), cv::Point(this->roi_.x_offset+this->roi_.width , this->roi_.y_offset+this->roi_.height ),
57  cv::Scalar( 255,255,255), 2 );
58  */
59  // Specify output image encoding
60  image_encoding = "mono8";
61 
62  // Check if learning time is over
63  double elapsed_time = ros::Time::now().toSec() - this->begin_.toSec();
64  if ( elapsed_time > this->duration_ ) {
65  std::cout << "********** LEARNING PROCESS FINISHED *************" << std::endl;
66  std::cout << "-------- Base descriptor --------" << std::endl;
67  this->blob_.getBase();
68  std::cout << "-------- Range descriptor --------" << std::endl;
69  this->blob_.getRange();
70 
71  this->begin_ = ros::Time::now();
72  }
73 
74  return 0;
75 
76  }

102  void Learning::resetParameters(void){
103  // Reset region of interest
104  roi_.x_offset = 0;
105  roi_.y_offset = 0;
106  roi_.width = this->width_;
107  roi_.height = this->height_;
108 
109  }

117  void Learning::cropImage(const cv::Mat &input_image, cv::Mat &output_image){
118  // Copy only region of interest
119 
120  output_image = cv::Mat(input_image, cv::Range(this->roi_.y_offset, this->roi_.y_offset+this->roi_.height-1), cv::Range(this->roi_.x_offset, this->roi_.x_offset+this->roi_.width-1) ).clone();
121  }

128  void Learning::rgbToGray(const cv::Mat &input_image, cv::Mat &output_image){
129  // openCV function for colorspace transformation
130  cv::cvtColor(input_image, output_image, CV_RGB2GRAY);
131  }

138  void Learning::grayToBW(const cv::Mat &input_image, cv::Mat &output_image){
139  // openCV function for thresholding
140  cv::GaussianBlur( input_image, output_image, cv::Size( 3, 3 ), 0, 0);
141  cv::threshold(input_image, output_image, this->threshold_, 255, cv::THRESH_BINARY_INV);
142 
143  }
